text: Itâ€™d be nice if timeline events for a contact were available via API (i.e., if the internal Timeline API call used by the HubSpot UI were part of the official HubSpot API)

I assume you mean not this? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/timeline/timeline-overview>

Something that would expose pageviews?
Yeah, that set of calls is app/integrator oriented, requires knowledge of the event type ID and event ID, etc.
Does anyone know a way to connect GA's goals to HubSpot? Such that, when a goal is counted in GA, it's reflected as an event on HubSpot?
